column5: A friend has come up with a new product for the hunting/fishing industry and is just working on the advertising materials for the hunting side of it. He needs a picture of a bow hunter in his camo prefferably with a deer in the picture.  If anyone can help it would be much appreciated and I would need permission to use the picture. (not sure what is required here perhaps TJ could email me a copy of a waver that he uses or something). There is no money involved but I can probably swing some free samples of the product for who ever submits the picture that gets used.    Thanks  Big Cliff
Hey Cliff,didnt you get one with a bow last year? Wish I could help out, I got the camo,but no deer with the bow.
Sorry Cliff. I thought I had one for you but upon closer inspection it was me wearing sweat pants and holding a beer running away from a skunk.  TTT
No wonder there are so many commedians out of work, they are all hanging out here  ya, I did get one last year but didn't take any pictures.
